com.skye.lover.view.fresco.zoomable

接口 ZoomableController

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultZoomableController

    public interface ZoomableController
    Interface for implementing a controller that works with ZoomableDraweeView to control the zoom.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  ZoomableController.Listener
      Listener interface.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      float getScaleFactor()
      Gets the current scale factor.
      android.graphics.Matrix getTransform()
      Gets the current transform.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Gets whether the controller is enabled.
      boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
      Allows the controller to handle a touch event.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables the controller.
      void setImageBounds(android.graphics.RectF imageBounds)
      Sets the bounds of the image post transform prior to application of the zoomable transformation.
      void setListener(ZoomableController.Listener listener)
      Sets the listener for the controller to call back when the matrix changes.
      void setViewBounds(android.graphics.RectF viewBounds)
      Sets the bounds of the view.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Gets whether the controller is enabled. This should return the last value passed to setEnabled(boolean).
        返回:
        whether the controller is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables the controller. The controller is enabled when the image has been loaded.
        参数:
        enabled - whether to enable the controller

      • setListener

        void setListener(ZoomableController.Listener listener)
        Sets the listener for the controller to call back when the matrix changes.
        参数:
        listener - the listener

      • getScaleFactor

        float getScaleFactor()
        Gets the current scale factor. A convenience method for calculating the scale from the transform.
        返回:
        the current scale factor

      • getTransform

        android.graphics.Matrix getTransform()
        Gets the current transform.
        返回:
        the transform

      • setImageBounds

        void setImageBounds(android.graphics.RectF imageBounds)
        Sets the bounds of the image post transform prior to application of the zoomable transformation.
        参数:
        imageBounds - the bounds of the image

      • setViewBounds

        void setViewBounds(android.graphics.RectF viewBounds)
        Sets the bounds of the view.
        参数:
        viewBounds - the bounds of the view

      • onTouchEvent

        boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Allows the controller to handle a touch event.
        参数:
        event - the touch event
        返回:
        whether the controller handled the event
